-- 参考文档：https://eco.dameng.com/document/dm/zh-cn/pm/dm_sql-introduction.html
-- auto-generated definition
drop table DM_BIG_FIELDS;
create table DM_BIG_FIELDS
(
    ID             integer IDENTITY(1,1) not null,
    LONG_NAME        LONG  not null,
    LONGVARCHAR_NAME        LONGVARCHAR  not null,
    IMAGE_NAME        IMAGE    not null,
    LONGVARBINARY_NAME        LONGVARBINARY   not null,
    BLOB_NAME        BLOB  not null,
    CLOB_NAME        CLOB  not null,
    BFILE_NAME         BFILE   not null,
    BINARY_NAME  BINARY(255) not null
);

SET IDENTITY_INSERT RESOURCE_SZGT ON;


INSERT INTO "SYSDBA"."DM_BIG_FIELDS"("ID", "LONG_NAME", "LONGVARCHAR_NAME", "IMAGE_NAME", "LONGVARBINARY_NAME",
                                     "BLOB_NAME", "CLOB_NAME", "BFILE_NAME", "BINARY_NAME")
